p: Coculture of primary CAFs with M6-Hh cells was sufficient to induce the expression of the Hh target genes Ptch2, Gli1, and Hhip in CAFs (Supplementary Fig. 3a, b) with concomitant upregulation of CSC markers Id3, Sox10, Itgb3, and Krt6b in M6-Hh cells (Supplementary Fig. 3a, c). Importantly, this stromal-epithelial malignant crosstalk was blocked by SMOi (Fig. 3a, Supplementary Fig. 3b, c). These data allow us to conclude that Hh signaling occurs solely in a paracrine manner in this murine model of TNBC and that CAFs are the therapeutic target of SMOi in TNBC.
